issue.title: Flag Popconfirm
issue.body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1332279/71440952-9d622080-2742-11ea-805b-c6b949702c79.png)

- [x] Arrow placement is wrong on mobile
- [x] Status doesn't change on flag / unflag - so you cannot toggle
- [x] It doesn't send username on mobile

issue.title: Share button doesn't work on mobile
issue.body:
I guess 

`navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);`

code doesn't work on mobile.

I tested it on both Safari and Chrome on iPhone.

issue.title: Upvote button responsiveness
issue.body:
When you click on upvote button on mobile (or some low latency environment), the button became active 2-3 seconds later.

Users may think the tap just didn’t go thorough so they tap it again, then it will vote and unvote immediately later on.

I guess we need to do it either one of those options 
1. Add loading image on button and disable it during the API calls
2. Make the button active immediately first and revoke only if error returned

I think option 2 is better.

issue.title: Hunt video freezes Chrome browser
issue.body:
Clues found so far:

1. Happens only on Chrome
2. Triggered when I type the video URL on submission page and click "Submit" button
3. Freeze whole system until I close the tab
4. I feel like it's related to the video played on the background
5. It's not related to browser extensions / cache / cookies because issue is the same on another user profile and incognito mode

issue.title: Video cannot be played when auto-play is prohibitted
issue.body:
When there's a auto-play disable feature on a browser (e.g. Brave browser blocks it by default)
I can see the play button, but the button is not clickable so there's no way I can play videos

issue.title: Playlist order
issue.body:
When I watch no 10th video and click skip button, 1st one on Yesterday’s ranking is played instead of 11th

It happens no matter how I loaded more video or not.

issue.title: Playlist order
issue.body:
When I watch no 10th video and click skip button, 1st one on Yesterday’s ranking is played instead of 11th

It happens no matter how I loaded more video or not.

issue.title: Prevent video play on mobile list view
issue.body:
When I submit a video on mobile, video is played in background, so I can hear the sound and there’s no way to stop

Sometimes video keeps playing in the background when I go back to listing view from the mobile video view.
